eu.df.jiffybox.builders

Interface JiffyBoxBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Builder<JiffyBoxBuilder>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJiffyBoxBuilder

    public interface JiffyBoxBuilder
extends Builder<JiffyBoxBuilder>
    This class is used to build JiffyBoxes. Use any of the methods you need and get the built object using the 'build' method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      JiffyBoxBuilder useSshKey(boolean useSshKey)
      Set whether to use a ssh key.

      • Methods inherited from interface eu.df.jiffybox.builders.Builder

        build

    • Method Detail

      • withPassword

        JiffyBoxBuilder withPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Set the password.
        Parameters:
        password - When the password should not be generated randomly is can be set using this parameter. If this parameter is not provided the password will be generated randomly and sent via e-mail.
        Returns:
        The same builder for method chaining.

      • useSshKey

        JiffyBoxBuilder useSshKey(boolean useSshKey)
        Set whether to use a ssh key.
        Parameters:
        useSshKey - When this parameter is provided and there is a SSH key saved within the control panel, this key will be granted root access to the newly created JiffyBox.
        Returns:
        The same builder for method chaining.

      • withMetadata

        JiffyBoxBuilder withMetadata(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode metadata)
        Set the metadata.
        Parameters:
        metadata - Each JiffyBox can contain optional data, which is returned on each request. This data is saved as hash for maximum flexibility. The value can be a complex type and will be returned just as it has been provided. The whole data may not exceed 4kb in size. Please notice, that this size refers to the generated JsonObject.
        Returns:
        The same builder for method chaining.
